description: Try our easy to follow Coffee Streusel Bundt Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coffee Streusel Bundt Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Turn cake out onto a serving plate. Drizzle with coffee icing. Cut into wedges and serve with coffee syrup.
